name: Mingxian Zhong
content: Mingxian ZhongSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationMingxian ZhongI am an assistant professor in the Computer Science department at Lehman College and the Graduate Center, CUNY. My research interests lie in graph theory and algorithms.I received my PhD from Columbia University in 2018, where my advisors were Maria Chudnovsky and Clifford Stein.I am part of a New York Combinatorics Group, where we organize the NY Combinatorics Seminar and other events, and you can find our website here.You can find my Google Scholar page here.Publications  Teaching  Contact  CVGoogle SitesReport abuseGoogle SitesReport abuse
